attributes.action: aggregate all petitions that have a similar intent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the petition subject search, many petitions still share a common theme and this dissipates the effect of support for that common theme. This petition requests that the significance of the shared theme is assessed upon the aggregate number of people supporting commonly-themed petitions, rather than each petition being judged in isolation.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
